title: Ae/Pr视觉特效插件大合集REVisionFX Effections Plus v20.0.3 Mac/Win版 含Twixtor/Flicker/RSMB
author: 大众脸
content: RE:Vision Effects 是一家专注于提供创新、先进的定制软件以创建、修改、控制和增强数字视频图像的公司。其产品广泛应用于电视、电影、互联网及视觉特效行业，涵盖从家庭编辑到高预算商业广告和大片制作的各类用户。本合集包含多个实用插件，支持 Adobe After Effects 与 Premiere Pro 软件，适用于 Mac 和 Windows 系统。
supported_versions: Adobe After Effects CS 6 – CC 2021, Adobe Premiere Pro CS 6 – CC 2021

download_links.name: Ae/Pr视觉特效插件大合集REVisionFX Effections Plus v20.0.3 Mac版（Monter Group）
Ae/Pr视觉特效插件大合集REVisionFX Effections Plus v20.0.3 CE Win Team VR一键版

other.plugin_intro: RE:vision Effects is a research and development company focused on providing innovative, advanced custom software to create, modify, control, and enhance digital video imagery at the highest quality. As co-founders of RE:vision Effects, Pierre Jasmin and Peter Litwinowicz head up a team of talented computer scientists, artists, software programmers, and industry experts dedicated to designing software solutions for virtually any digital pixel manipulation problem. While they have the artistry to dream up novel and compelling visual looks and effects, they also have seemingly magical powers to make video pixels move in a way that brings these illusions to life.
plugin_list_mac: DE:Noise v3.3.0 - 视频降噪插件
FieldsKit v3.6.0 - 动画反交错插件
RE:Fill v2.4.0 - 智能修补和填充插件
RE:Flex v5.4.0 - 扭曲变形/变脸插件
RE:Grade v1.1.0 - 调色插件（新插件）
RE:Lens v2.1.2 - 鱼眼广角镜头畸变扭曲修复插件
RE:Map v3.2.0 - UV贴图映射插件
RE:Match v2.3.1 - 色彩匹配插件
ReelSmart Motion Blur Pro v6.2.0 - 动态模糊插件
SmoothKit v3.5.1 - 降噪磨皮美颜插件
Twixtor Pro v7.2.0 - 超级慢动作变速插件
Video Gogh v3.9.0 - 水彩油画插件
